18using UnityEngine;
19using System.Collections;
20using UnityEngine.SceneManagement;
21
22namespace Valve.VR.InteractionSystem
23{
27 public class RestartScene : MonoBehaviour
28 {
32 private bool buttonPressDisabled = false;
36 private float disableTime = 0.1f;
37 private string sceneName = "SceneSelect";
38
43 void OnTriggerEnter(Collider other)
44 {
45 if (buttonPressDisabled) return;
46 buttonPressDisabled = true;
47 }
48
53 void OnTriggerExit(Collider other)
54 {
55 if (!buttonPressDisabled) return;
56
57 executeAction();
58 StartCoroutine(EnableAfterSeconds());
59 }
60
65 IEnumerator EnableAfterSeconds()
66 {
67 yield return new WaitForSeconds(disableTime);
68 buttonPressDisabled = false;
69 }
70
74 private void executeAction()
75 {
76 SceneManager.LoadScene(sceneName, LoadSceneMode.Single);
77 }
78 }
79}

Controls the restart functionality for the current scene.
